channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: What we know about the man who disarmed alleged shooter at Australia's Bondi Beach
item.description: Ahmed al Ahmed, 43, disarmed one of the alleged assailants during the Hanukkah attack in Bondi Beach on Sunday.

item.title: Scottie Scheffler wins PGA Tour player of the year for 4th straight year
item.description: Scottie Scheffler topped the ballot against Rory McIlroy, Tommy Fleetwood and Ben Griffin, though the PGA Tour did not release what percentage of the ...

item.title: Rob Reiner's son arrested for murder in stabbing death of famed director, wife
item.description: Director Rob Reiner and his wife, Michele Singer, were found stabbed to death in their Los Angeles home on Sunday, and the couple's son, Nick Reiner, ...

item.title: WATCH: Brown University students hide from shooter until police arrive
item.description: Dramatic video showed students hunkered down behind bookshelves at Brown University on Saturday until police were able to escort them to safety.

item.title: Trump disparages Rob Reiner's political views a day after his murder
item.description: Actor and director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele were found dead in their Los Angeles home over the weekend.

item.title: What to know about the search for the Brown University shooting suspect
Nick Reiner, son of Rob Reiner and wife Michele, arrested for their murders
item.description: Nick Reiner, a son of director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele, has been arrested on murder charges following their deaths, police said.

item.title: WATCH: Pickup truck loses control on icy road in Connecticut
item.description: Security camera video captured the moment a pickup truck lost control and smashed into a telephone pole amid wintry conditions in Southington, Connect...

item.title: Watch: Trump calls Rob Reiner "deranged" while taking questions a day after director's death
item.description: President Trump on Monday doubled down on his disparagement of actor and director Rob Reiner, a day after Reiner and his wife Michele were found dead ...

item.title: WATCH: Brown University students hide from shooter until police arrive
item.description: Dramatic video showed students hunkered down behind bookshelves at Brown University on Saturday until police were able to escort them to safety.

item.title: Spotify says it's investigating after thousands of users report outages
item.description: Tens of thousands of Spotify users reported outages on Monday, with some saying they had lost access to their playlists.

item.title: Search for the Brown University shooter resumes as questions swirl about campus security
